Title: Relates to adjusting the tax on gaming revenues in region one
Summary: Adjusts the tax rate on gaming revenues in region one, and requires gaming facilities to maintain the number of full-time equivalent employees as they employed in the year two thousand nineteen.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to adjusting the tax on gaming revenues in region one
